  #print(f'abfss://{logging_file_system}@{logging_storageacc}.dfs.core.windows.net/{environment}/{business_unit}/{layer}/{str_date}{name_prefix}{business_item}.log')

def create_log_df(df):  
    df['modify_dts'] = datetime.utcnow().isoformat()
    df['submitter_id'] = mssparkutils.env.getUserId()
    df['spark_pool'] = mssparkutils.env.getPoolName()
    df['livy_id'] = mssparkutils.env.getJobId()
    df = df[['modify_dts', 'submitter_id', 'spark_pool', 'livy_id', 'severity', 'msg']]
    return df
